sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>moon</radical> <radical>table</radical> is a table that's made entirely of <kanji>skin</kanji>. You thought the table was made of moon, with all those pores and such, but when you look more closely, you realize it's skin. Disgusting, porous, skin.
meaningInfo: Touch it and feel the "moon table." You know it's not made of moon. How ridiculous.
readingMnemonic: But, when you go to touch this "moon table" made of <kanji>skin</kanji>, you realize that it's <reading>harder</reading> (<ja>はだ</ja>) than you expected.
readingInfo: You'd think skin would be softer, but it's pretty hard. Much harder than you expected.
